Text: RE ReminderDear Mo Thank you for all of your help with this job search I hope Victor was happy let me know if he has any questions I hope your last day at work is a great one I will shoot you an email and we can get together for some good cooking I hope to hear from you soon Keep your chin up and focus on your dream it will all work out well XOXOXOXOX Scott wrote Scott Victor de la Madrid is the guy you will be meeting with He would like you to come in to sit w him on Friday from am There is a parking garage that is caddycorner to our building that you can park in If you come downtown via allen parkway and take the downtown exit that says Northstaying in the left hand lane that will put you on Clay and West Dallasstay on Clay and there will be the Allen Center Garage on your right the visitor entrance will be before the next light Once you enter the main enron buildinggo to the security desk in the front and have them buzz me as your visitor I will send a runner to get you bc we will be busy trading at that time Once you are on our floor Ill get you over to Victor Please call me if you have any questionsmy work phone is Original Message From Scott Atlas ENRON Sent Tuesday October AM To Sanchez Monique Subject Reminder Hey Mo Just shooting you a reminder as per your request I hope you are ok let me know if you need anything Scott Do You Yahoo NEW from Yahoo GeoCities quick and easy web site hosting just month psinfo This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you Do You Yahoo Make a great connection at Yahoo Personals
